title: West Point cancels ceremony to honor Tom Hanks as ‘outstanding US citizen’
summary: Tom Hanks, an advocate for military memorials, has made a recent decision that lacks clarity. Despite his support for the initiatives, he also cast his vote for Biden. The specifics of the decision remain undisclosed.

title: US Open tennis 2025: Aryna Sabalenka beats Amanda Anisimova in women’s singles final – as it happened
summary: Aryna Sabalenka successfully defended her US Open title by defeating Amanda Anisimova, who struggled with consistency throughout the match. This victory marks Anisimova's second consecutive loss in a major final. Sabalenka's strong performance showcased her ability to remain composed under pressure.

title: Aryna Sabalenka sweeps aside Amanda Anisimova to retain US Open title
summary: Aryna Sabalenka won her second consecutive US Open title by defeating Amanda Anisimova with a score of 6-3, 7-6 (3) in the final. The match showcased Sabalenka's strong performance, particularly in the tiebreak of the second set. This victory solidifies her position as a top contender in women's tennis.

title: Fuze review – twisty London-set heist thriller should have stolen some personality
summary: Scottish director David Mackenzie has cast Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Theo James in a new film featuring a plot filled with double-crossing. Despite its intriguing premise, the movie lacks visual flair and stylistic depth. The film aims to deliver a thrilling narrative but may fall short in execution.
